attributes.title: UMB Group 1 Example
attributes.description: This is a sourcemap of the supply chain for Honest Tea
This retailer receives the bottled teas from the distributor and sells them to customers.
attributes.address: 27931 Kelly Johnson Parkway, Santa Clarita, CA 91355, USA
attributes.title: Wal-Mart

attributes.description:
This retailer receives the bottled teas from the distributor and sells them to customers.

Honest Tea began with its founder, Seth Goldman, taking a thermos of brewed tea to a local Whole Foods distributor. Whole Foods loved it, and Honest Tea found its first shelf space. It was a logical initial step: The tea came from natural ingredients. Whole Foods sells only natural goods.

Goldman faced a problem though when he took the tea to other distributors. They hated it.

"They said it wasn't sweet enough. They said it tasted like grass," he said at the Inc. 500|5000 Conference.

So to get the product to new stores, in front of more customers, Goldman broke down the supply chain. To get to gourmet stores, he contracted with a cheese distributor, who would bring Honest Tea on his truck along with his cheddars and mozzarellas. To reach delis, he contacted a corned-beef distributor. For grocery stores: a charcoal distributor.
attributes.title: Whole Foods

attributes.description: The bottles are sent to the distributor, who then ships them off to retail locations.  2010: Honest Tea launches a guerrilla marketing effort called "Honest Cities." Unmanned kiosks filled with Honest Tea products were set up in Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, and Washington, D.C.
attributes.title: Coca Cola Distributor

attributes.description: Here, the tea leaves are brewed, then strained and bottled. Then the company ships the bottled tea out to their different distributors.
attributes.title: Honest Tea Brewing

attributes.description: Here is where the Tea Leaves are grown, picked and sent back to the factory for brewing. Honest Tea is unlike other tea companies where they actually brew their teas instead of using a syrup or chemical blend.
attributes.title: Tea Leaves are grown and picked
Tea Leaves are grown and picked to Honest Tea Brewing
Honest Tea Brewing to Coca Cola Distributor
Coca Cola Distributor to Whole Foods
